```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(xgboost)
library(caret)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
# Load the data 
mDat = read.csv("train_v3.csv")
mDat2 = read.csv("test_v3.csv")
# clean the data
mDat$Delay.Indicator = as.factor(mDat$Delay.Indicator)
temp = select(mDat,Trip,Day.of.Month,Delay.Indicator)

index = createDataPartition(temp$Delay.Indicator,p = 0.6, list = FALSE)

train.data  <- temp[index, ]
test.data <- temp[-index, ]

```

```{r}
model = train(Delay.Indicator~.,
              data = train.data,method = "xgbTree",
              trControl = trainControl("cv",number = 10))
model$bestTune
```
